profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes leveraging open-source large language models (LLMs) for platform enhancement, which is a core responsibility of a GenAI Engineer. While 'Machine Learning Engineer' is in the title, the specific focus on LLMs, natural language processing, and the lifecycle management of models in production, including MLOps, aligns more closely with the GenAI Engineer profile. The mention of 'prototyping and development' on-premise and the 'growing MLops infrastructure' further support this, as GenAI Engineers often build and deploy generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions 'Apply Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence to personalization, discovery, fraud detection and natural language processing' and 'Design Machine Learning solutions'. The focus on 'leveraging open source large language models' and 'natural language processing' points directly to generative modeling tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Apply Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence to personalization, discovery, fraud detection and natural language processing

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and adaptation of models, a core aspect of the Modeling task category.
job_tasks.phrase: Design Machine Learning solutions for TicketSwap's unique product challenges

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Manage models entire lifecycle from prototyping, to deployment, to continuous improvement and monitoring' encompasses the end-to-end operational aspects of machine learning models, which is the definition of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Manage models entire lifecycle from prototyping, to deployment, to continuous improvement and monitoring

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Producing data insights: extract value from data and drive improvements and strategic decisions' implies data handling, analysis, and feature extraction to inform models and decisions.
job_tasks.phrase: Producing data insights: extract value from data and drive improvements and strategic decisions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with the different stakeholders, understand their problems and come up with solutions' highlights the need to bridge business needs with technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with the different stakeholders, understand their problems and come up with solutions

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development and maintenance of the operational infrastructure for ML models.
job_tasks.phrase: Help with the continuing development of our MLops pipeline

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'With data driven decision making playing an important role the ML products you develop will have real impact on customers and the business' emphasizes understanding the business impact and aligning technical work with business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: With data driven decision making playing an important role the ML products you develop will have real impact on customers and the business

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with the different stakeholders, understand their problems and come up with solutions
shaping these initiatives from the ground up - from conceptualizing new ideas to bringing them to life
Apply Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence to personalization, discovery, fraud detection and natural language processing
